pkgmetadata.longdescription: Count Longitudinal Data // Performs regression analysis for longitudinal count data, allowing for serial dependence among observations from a given individual and two dimensional random effects on the linear predictor. Estimation is via maximization of the exact likelihood of a suitably defined model. Missing values and unbalanced data are allowed; M. Helena Goncalves et al.(2007) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2007.03.002.
